dict.acceptation: 全部的；一切的；各种的；极度的，尽量的；
全部；一切；每个人，每件东西；全部情况；
全部地；完全地；每个；非常；
全体；[常作A-]整体；[常与my, your, his, her等连用]（某人）所有的一切；

sent.orig: All efforts of mediation by a third party were in vain at all.
sent.trans: 第三方所作的从中调解的一切努力均告失败。

sent.orig: All in all, it has been a great success.
All in all, there were twenty present.
All patriots belong to one big family, whether they rally to the common cause early or late.; All patriots belong to one big family, whether they come forward early or late.
sent.trans: 爱国一家，爱国不分先后。

sent.orig: Death pays all debts and all thoughts are dashed.
